sub_topic: Determining the diameter of a graph.
message_1: Consider a simple undirected graph G with n vertices and edge set E. Let the diameter of G be d(G), which is defined as the longest shortest path between any two vertices of G. Given a graph with n = 7 vertices and the following edge set E = {(1,2), (1,3), (3,4), (3,5), (4,6), (5,7)}, determine the diameter of the graph.
